description.value: You take careful aim with your shots so that your bullets ricochet off solid surfaces. When determining if you have line of effect to a target you've aimed at, you can choose one solid surface within your weapon's first range increment to ricochet your shot to hit your target; determine line of effect from the chosen ricochet surface, rather than your location. If the creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Undetected], the GM still rolls a flat check in secret to see if you missed, but the flat check becomes DC 5.
